data.text: Now, we are progressively bringing the fleet home to continue their next journey. How do we manage this unprecedented operation involving multiple locations around the world. With lots of planning, coordination, and even more heart.

urls.title: Where We're Flying | Cathay Pacific
urls.description: We’re still flying | Here you’ll find the most up-to-date information regarding our current and upcoming flights.

data.text:
“I truly believe it is more than ‘just a job’ 💪🏻. Like many of us at Cathay, we are excited to once again welcoming people from the world to our home, and helping passengers back into the air, flying towards their next destinations!✈️”

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #CathayPeople
“We helped him board and he made it to his daughter's wedding on time! Something I’m sure both of us will never forget.🎉"

“One time, a passenger missed the flight to his daughter’s wedding. He was so anguished and sad. It would have surely been a lifelong regret. I decided that I could not let it happen.” With the team’s support, Yuly was able to secure a new flight in time.
“The work here is dynamic and unique. When we solve challenges coming our way, it sometimes feels like we are creating magical moments.🪄” Yuly says.

Meet Yuly Wong, our Customer Service Officer in the Premium Service Team. Yuly makes sure passengers receive the most efficient and personalised services upon departure and arriving the airport. https://t.co/BgGHUDUgPh
@_SheikhWajahat @raisinganchor I hope so.

urls.description: Cathay Pacific’s approach to sustainable development and climate change.

data.text:
Our commitment to in-flight waste reduction has led us to turn recycled bottles into blankets. So you can rest easy knowing you’re flying more sustainable.

Discover more of our sustainable solutions at https://t.co/cjIfODDDQm

#GreenCathay #flygreener

Whether for passenger or cargo flights, we wholeheartedly believe the Third Runway will promise new possibilities for everyone. Here’s to the new heights it will take our home of Hong Kong. 🎉

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond
The aircraft that marked this occasion was none other than our ‘Queen of the Skies’. ✈️ Arriving from Shanghai, our 747 freighter landed at the new runway as part of the operation familiarisation.
It’s a huge day for us at Cathay Pacific! This morning, we landed the very first commercial flight at the new Third Runway of the Hong Kong International Airport.🇭🇰 https://t.co/iou4Sw4Fg0

data.text: Hong Kong has always been a canvas to tell your story 🎨, and we’re not speaking metaphorically. For one, Sheung Wan’s Shing Wong Street is famous for its epic and grammable street art. You also don’t want to miss Sai Ying Pun’s ArtLane and Kam Tin’s Mural Village. https://t.co/C4qRL7K3oa

urls.title: Typhoon Chaba is affecting our flights to/from Hong Kong
urls.description: There are currently no important alerts. Click "View all "to read our travel advisories. We're waiving ticket change and cancellation fees, so you can rearrange your plans easily. View our special ticketing guidelines to learn more. Contact your travel agent directly to organise changes. If you have questions that require a response, please contact us for assistance. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience. Your feedback will help us improve our website experience.

data.text: Typhoon #Chaba is currently affecting our flight operations into and out of HK with possible disruptions, delays, diversions, cancellations to some of our flights. Please check the status of your flight before coming to the airport. Details: https://t.co/CIs9YFByiH

@HaroonS78107860 Hi Sir, how can I help you?

At the end of the day, everything is worthwhile for Alvin and his team. It is also thanks to them, we get to enjoy blockbusters inflight even before they are screening in Hong Kong!🎉.

#cathaypacific #MoveBeyond #CathayPeople

You may be surprised with the work and planning that go into releasing movies inflight! It starts with selection, then working around the clock to liaise with studios worldwide. There are also subtitle creation and adding the titles with the tech team.
This drives Alvin’s dedication to perfecting IFE, from getting the best movie titles to the smallest details, such as the background music when IFE is not in use.😯
“Once the passengers are aboard, IFE is perhaps the biggest source of entertainment, which gives us the responsibility to offer the best and unique experience that meets their expectations.”
